DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY FOCUS : MISSION VIEJO ; SEAT OPEN ON CITY TRAFFIC COMMISSION
DOC.TEXT: Residents interested in a position on the Traffic and Transportation Commission can pick_up application_forms at City_Hall . The commission is responsible_for traffic and parking issues in the city , and there is one vacancy on the five-member municipal body , which meets the third Wednesday of every month in City_Hall . The open seat was recently vacated by Commissioner Patsy Wood . The deadline for filing the application is 5 p.m. April 15 . The form must be returned to the city clerk ' s office . Commissioners must be Mission Viejo residents and registered voters . For more information about the opening , call ( 714 ) 348-2052 . FRANK MESSINA
